subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Nearly two months after the death of Barbaro, trainer Michael Matz will now try to take a horse who has never started a stakes race all the way to the Kentucky Derby winner’s circle.
snippet: Nearly two months after the death of Barbaro, trainer Michael Matz will now try to take a horse who has never started a stakes race all the way to the Kentucky Derby winner’s circle.
